Bloomberg Businessweek has an interesting report citing those infamous "people in the know," claiming that Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer is readying a management shakeup which will place more senior product executives who have a strong engineering background. The thinking: Microsoft needs more technology-minded top dogs to help the company compete( or at least to provide the outward impression that engineering prowess still matters in Redmond).
